column4: I accidentally changed a bunch of permissions in /var/log. How can I find out which permissions the directories should have?
look at the linux fhs file system, that should give you an idea, or get the infro from someone elses system
isn't that information somewhere in apt? because during installation, it makes the dirs usable by the equivalent users, eg. /var/log/news news:news
no, it's part of the package
